title: Operations Assistant
job_overview:
Operations Assistant
Remote | Full-Time
PST hours: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM (with 30-minute lunch break)

We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Operation Assistant to support our business operations. The ideal candidate will assist in managing administrative tasks, ensuring compliance, maintaining essential business records.

Job Responsibilities:
-Collaborate with other teams and perform other related duties as assigned
-Assist in the preparation and drafting of documents for newly established companies
-Coordinate and maintain business insurance policies, ensuring coverage is up to date and meets regulatory requirements.
-Liaise with insurance brokers and carriers for policy renewals, and claims.
Maintain accurate records of insurance policies, premiums, and claims history
-Handle and maintain documentation of business licenses, certifications and other regulatory requirements.
-Managing corporate registrations, renewals, and compliance flings.
-Keep track of all business-related documents, ensuring proper organization and accessibility.
-Manage inbound and outbound mail, ensuring timely handling and distribution.
-Provide general administrative support, including data entry, record-keeping file management.
-Support the leadership team with various ad hoc tasks as needed.

Qualifications:
-Has previous experience in administrative or operations support roles, ideally in business insurance
-Proficiency in office management software such as MS Office, Google Workspace, or other administrative support tools.
-Excellent attention to detail with a focus on accuracy and quality.
-Strong organizational and time-management skills.
-Ability to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously.
-Strong written and verbal communication skills.
-Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information.
